short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful training software that helps companies Execute Better. Equip your employees to reach their full potential.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The WorkRamp Chrome extension allows your learners to easily search for WorkRamp resources and training content in their day to day workflows. 

Allow your admins to increase learner engagement with WorkRamp by providing learners an easy way to access training wherever theyâ€™re working in Chrome. 

Give learners easy ways to access WorkRamp content in their workflow so they can learn their jobs quickly and refresh their knowledge at any time. 

Use cases: 

Onboarding: During onboarding, learners can access their WorkRamp training anywhere in Chrome so they can onboard quickly and retain knowledge from their training. 

Support: Support reps can access WorkRamp training in their workflow so they can serve their customers with the most accurate, up to date product information from their WorkRamp training.
